TextBlock.Text: HYACINTH: Ah, a dark corner with the gentle sounds of water, perfect.
HYACINTH: Really helps calm my nerves after being chased by the residents of a ship no one but me knows about.
HYACINTH: So, in my desire to explore, I forgot to consider the possibility that I am tresspassing.
HYACINTH: But the flame of curiosity compels me to continue searching for answers. I'll return shortly.
HYACINTH: It seems they used to live on the moon of a ringed gas giant, but heard the signal of The Eye and traveled here.
HYACINTH: Sounds similar to what everyone else said about their arrival here, I wonder if this species' home was destroyed in the process too.
HYACINTH: This Eye of The Universe stuff is depressing me, how about some adventure to.. that lone raft across the river?
